text: The chapel's exterior in 2006 Lois Perkins Chapel is a chapel on the Southwestern University campus in Georgetown, Texas, United States. Built in 1950, the chapel is named after alumnae Lois Perkins. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1950 establishments in Texas Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1950 Category:Buildings and structures in Georgetown, Texas Category:Chapels in the United States Category:Southwestern University
title: Lois Perkins Chapel
